thread.title: G,G. Black
thread.title_full: Easy Comforts reviewed by G,G. Black

author: G,G. Black
title: G,G. Black
text:
It was very Bad...You guys typed in the WRONG Zip Code and it took two weeks for it to get to the Post Office that corrected your error.
The packaging was so bad that the Worker at the Post Office asked if I wanted to send it back...It was the worse package I've ever gotten from a Business that I paid for.
I'm sorry to send you Bad news but I doubt I will prder anything else fro you guys. I wished it would have been better service but you guys dropped the ball on this one..
Sorry
Mr. Black
